254BAD24.Line10.BC41C: Something in the water is making us sick. Some have died... both Wolves and civilians in our care.

7581D8F1.VoiceDir10.BC41C: Concerned. Heavy. Needs to solve this.

8D1D932C.Line18.BC41C: We have to find the source, regardless. Wanderer, would you meet me south of here? I want to check the shoreline.

DD53BEF9.VoiceDir18.BC41C: Decisive. Turning to Player, ready to leave.

F33404EE.Line16.D5161: It’s poison, I’m telling you! The bandits want to wipe us out.
